title: List all assignments for a reservation
description: Retrieves a list of all assignments for a specified BigQuery reservation. An assignment connects a project, folder, or organization to a reservation.

objective.narrative: This sample helps developers programmatically check how a reservation's capacity is allocated. For example, an administrator can use this to verify that only intended projects are assigned to a high-cost reservation before performing a cost analysis.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_assignments_list
regionTags.title: List all assignments for a reservation
